sourceMeaningMnemonic: The radical <radical>white</radical> and the kanji <kanji>white</kanji> are the same.
meaningInfo: Study your radicals hard! Most important thing!
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>white</kanji> team was the first to be able to <reading>hack</reading> (<ja>はく</ja>) the <kanji>white</kanji> iPhone.
readingInfo: Imagine two teams (black and <kanji>white</kanji>), wearing their team colors, working really hard on hacking the iPhone. It is a huge contest, and people are watching with a lot of tension, to see who will hack the <kanji>white</kanji> iPhone first. Feel that tension, and see the colors separating them so vividly. The colors are important, and the excitement of the winner holding up the <reading>hack</reading>ed iPhone is too.
